SEARCH
Package view.Pharmacist.prescription

Class PharmacistPrescribeMedicineView

java.lang.Object
view.View
view.Pharmacist.prescription.PharmacistPrescribeMedicineView
public final class PharmacistPrescribeMedicineView extends View
This view allows the pharmacist to prescribe medicine for a selected appointment. It displays the appointment details and the list of prescriptions.
Since:
2024-11-10
